TaxonIdentification.species_authority: Schleicher ex F. Weber & D. Mohr

treatment.description: Aerial stems persisting more than a year, unbranched, 6--55 cm; lines of stomates single; ridges 3--12. Sheaths green with black apical band, spreading, 1--6 × 1--5 mm; teeth 3--14, not articulate. Cone apex pointed; spores green, spheric. 2 n =216.

key_statement.statement: Sheath teeth erect, with prominent white margins.
Sheath teeth incurved, with obscure margins or all black.
